div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActInvoiceDetailDrugProductCode

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
_ActInvoiceDetailDrugProductCodeActInvoiceDetailDrugProductCodeAn identifying data string for A substance used as a medication or in the preparation of medication.

description.value: An identifying data string for A substance used as a medication or in the preparation of medication.
